detaileddescription.para:
The maximum value EBHSM can accept the Polling
values 0xFFu

Start of encrypt message.Position inside M4 message where the encrypted part starts which is not dependent on SHE slot UID
values 16u

End of encrypt message.Position inside M4 message where the encrypted part ends which is not dependent on SHE slot UID
values 32u

Length of the messages m1, m3, m5 and m5hsm is 16 bytes
values 16u

Total read length of the messages m4hsm(32u) and m5hsm(16u) is 48 bytes
values 48u

Length of the messages m2, m4 and m4hsm is 32 bytes
values 32u

Length of reading the data by identifier EFC5
values 2u

Length of writing the data by EFC5 identifier with M4 and M5 message
values 145u

Length of writing the data by EFC5 identifier without M4 and M5 message
values 97u

Length of reading the data by identifier EFF2
values 2u

Length of writing the data by EFF2 identifier with M4 and M5 message
values 144u

Length of writing the data by EFF2 identifier without M4 and M5 message
values 96u

KDM Key Identifier for SHE+ Key Slot 11
values 11u

KDM Key Identifier for SHE+ Key Slot 20
values 20u

Definition of the pending state of the Real Time Environment
values 10u
Enumeration of different states in shewrite process

The structure variable hold all shewrite required data and also holds M1-M5 messages in a structure element.
range The structure elements holds Status,States and Messages values uint8 unit N/A resolution N/A context task protection {The variable Vkms_shewrite_var is Static} storage class normal ram
Security Relevance
Security-Relevant. Reason: Used in function where spr_requirement is tagged

The structure variable hold all shewrite required data and also holds M1-M5 messages in a structure element.
range The structure elements holds Status,States and Messages values uint8 unit N/A resolution N/A context {task} protection {The variable shewrite_var1 is Static}
Security Relevance
Security-Relevant. Reason: Used in function where spr_requirement is tagged

Variable indicates the IS key Write Status. Bit7&6 -> contains shewrite state IDLE,OPEN,LOAD,POLL and Bit 5-0 -> Indicates the HSM error codes, range from 0x00 to 0x2D
range uint8 values uint8 unit N/A resolution N/A context {task} protection {The variable VkmsISkeywrite_state is Static}
Security Relevance
Security-Relevant. Reason: Used in function where spr_requirement is tagged

The key range specifier COMM_KEY_RANGE_STD denotes SHE and COMM_KEY_RANGE_EXTEND denotes SHE+
range The structure elements holds the multiple COMM_KEY_RANGEs values 0x00-0xFEu unit N/A resolution N/A context {task} protection {The variable shekeyrange_var is Static}
Security Relevance
Security-Relevant. Reason: Used in function where spr_requirement is tagged
